values.desc: Returns a CharSequence that will mirror the contents of the source CharSequence but with the characters in getOriginal replaced by ones from getReplacement.

values.code: onFocusChanged(view: View!, sourceText: CharSequence!, focused: Boolean, direction: Int, previouslyFocusedRect: Rect!)

values.desc: Returns the list of characters that are to be replaced by other characters when displayed.
Returns a parallel array of replacement characters for the ones that are to be replaced.
